name: css-border-widths
description: Css module of single purpose classes for border widths

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-border-widths.css > css/css-border-widths.css && tachyons src/css-border-widths.css --minify > css/css-border-widths.min.css && tachyons src/css-border-widths.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
